attributes.action: ban smoking in the parliamentary bars etc in line with the rest of the nation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: laws have been passed to stop the public smoking in the bars, restaurants and public places throughout the country. yet M.P's can still choose to smoke within the confines of parliament.Why? should they not have to undergo the same restraints as the rest of us and not smoke in these evironments?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
